Translations.Text: sadqe sirf faqiro ke liye hai aur miskino ke liye aur un ke wasool karne walo ke liye aur un ke liye jin ke dil par chae jate9 ho aur gardan chodane mein aur qarz daro ke liye aur Allah ki rah mein aur rahero musafiro ke liye farz hai Allah ki taraf se aur Allah ilm wa hikmath wala hai

un mein se wo bhi hai jo paighambar ko eza dete hai aur kehte hai kan ka kaccha hai,aap keh dijiye ke wo kan tumhare bhale ke liye hai,wo Allah par iman rakhta hai aur musalmano ki bath ka yaqin karta hai aur tum mein se jo ahale iman hai,ye un ke liye rehmath hai,rasoolullah(saws) ko jo log eza dete hai un ke liye dukh ki mar hai
mahez tumhe khush karne ke liye tumhare samne Allah ki qasme kha jate hai,halan ke agar ye imandar hote tuh Allah aur us ka rasol razamand karne ke zyada mustaheq thein
kya ye nahi jante ke jo bhi Allah ki aur us ke rasol ki muqalifath karega,us ke liye yaqinan dozakh ki aag hai jis mein wo hamesha rehne wala hai,ye zabardast ruswai hai

munafiqo ko har waqt us bath ka khatka laga rehta hai ke kahi musalmano par koi surath na utre jo un ke dilo ki batein unhe batla de,keh dijiye ke tum mazaq udate raho,yaqinan Allah tala ose zaahir karne wala hai jis se tum dar dabak rahe ho
agar aap un se poche tuh saaf keh denge ke hum tuh yu hee apas mein has bol rahe thein,keh dijiye ke Allah us ki ayate aur us ka rasol hee tumhare hasi mazaq ke liye reh gae hai
